trend.name: AI Reaction Videos
trend.description: Creators are reacting to AI-generated content, from hilarious fails to mind-blowing creations. This format combines tech curiosity with entertainment value.

trend.name: Dance Challenge Revival
trend.description: Classic dance challenges are making a comeback with modern twists. Creators are remixing iconic moves with current songs.

trend.name: Tech Satire Skits
trend.description: Comedy sketches poking fun at tech culture, startup life, and Silicon Valley stereotypes are resonating with audiences.

trend.name: GRWM Storytimes
trend.description: Get Ready With Me videos combined with dramatic storytelling are dominating. Authentic, unfiltered content performs best.

trend.name: Day in My Life: Remote Worker Edition
trend.description: Work-from-home lifestyle content showing productive routines, home office setups, and the reality of remote work.

trend.name: Cooking with Chaos
trend.description: Chaotic cooking videos where things go wrong (sometimes intentionally) are outperforming polished recipe content.

trend.name: Book Reviews TikTok Style
trend.description: BookTok continues strong with quick, emotional book reviews and recommendations driving massive engagement.

trend.name: Pet Reaction Compilations
trend.description: Pets reacting to sounds, other animals, or their owners' antics. Simple but highly shareable content format.

trend.name: Mini Vlog Format
trend.description: Ultra-short vlogs (under 60 seconds) capturing a single moment or activity. Low effort, high authenticity.

trend.name: POV Drama Series
trend.description: Multi-part POV storytelling with cliffhangers keeping audiences coming back. Serialized content strategy working well.
